name: Slag Horn
description: Slag Horn is an optional boss introduced in God of War: Ragnarök. It can be fought during the Path of Destruction favor. It is found deep within the Vanaheim jungle. Codex[] A drake we tracked in the jungles of Vanaheim. One that seemed to enjoy burrowing under the earth and goring its victims to death with its tusks. Freya tells me these creatures were not native to this realm; there is now one fewer of their numbers. Description[] Slag Horn is a big beast with plenty of attacks to keep you on your toes. Every once in a while, Slag Horn will try to take a bite out of you. Every once in a while, Slag Horn will try to take a bite out of you. Slag Horn is raising its tail from behind.Occasionally, Slag Horn will get up on its two back legs for a moment and smash back down its front legs, creating a shock wave that will hurt you if it hits you. One of these can be easy to avoid, but Slag Horn will sometimes do this three times in rapid succession. Slag Horn will sometimes swing its head from side to side, threatening to damage you with its horns and tusks. Slag Horn winding up its tail, it’s about to spin around to hit you with a tail swipe. So, throw your spears at his legs, explode them, and wait for Slag Horn to collapse. Once Slag Horn is on its side, rush in and deal as much damage as you can before it gets back up.
